channel.title: Need GFX Designer
channel.description: Hello there, I am Dom and I am going to be making a RSPS with my friend Mike. We have both hosted a server before, however we can not get in contact with our previous GFX Designer due to the fact that he lives in Indonesia. If we could get some help, the person willing to do GFX's would receive GFX Designer rank on our server. Thanks for reading and hope you can help us on our quest to make a new RSPS PM me or reply to this post if you would like to be our GFX Designer -Dom

item.title: Need GFX Designer
item.dc:creator: @skiller8860 skiller8860
item.description:
@skiller8860 wrote:

Well. I can design templates fairly well, logos, and possibly other things. If you’d like to see something of my work. Please let me know and I’ll design anything you want me to design to prove
I can do it, HOWEVER It won’t be for your servers name due to you may try to use me.
